text: Talthybia is a genus of Asian orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Talthybia depressa. It was first described by Tamerlan Thorell in 1898, and has only been found in China and Myanmar. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Asia Category:Taxa named by Tamerlan Thorell
title: Talthybia
